title: Ignite
content:
End User Licence Agreement (“Agreement”) – Harman IGNITE App Store Service

Welcome to Ignite, a totally new in-car experience that allows you to browse, view, and download the latest Android music, information, game apps directly to your vehicle’s infotainment system. (“Ignite Services”).

This Agreement governs your use of the Ignite Services, through which you can browse and install content and services provided by Third-Party Apps, including buying, licensing, renting or subscribing to products and services from within those Third Party Apps (“In-App Purchases”) (collectively, “Content”). The Ignite Services are only meant to be available in the country where this vehicle was originally purchased (“Home Country”).. To use the Ignite Services, your vehicle needs Internet access, which you are responsible for securing separately.

VEHICLE AND DEVICE COMPATIBILITY:

These Ignite Services are available only for vehicles with an infotainment head unit approved by Harman International Industries, Incorporated (“Harman”) and as also approved by the manufacturer of your vehicle. IGNITE and the Services are not available on any other type of vehicle, nor on Devices which are unaffiliated to a vehicle.

License to Use Content:

Within the Ignite Service, you will have the ability to browse through a multitude of Third Party Apps that may be pre-loaded as well as additional Apps that you browse and can choose to download. Whether a Third Party App was preloaded or later loaded on-demand following you choosing to download it, your licence to use that Third Party App is governed by the terms and conditions set forth by that Third Party App provider.

UPDATES

From time to time, Harman may push updates for the Ignite Services. Additionally, the Third Party Apps you operate within the Ignite Services may push updates for their App. You should agree to taking updates of the Ignite Services and Third Party Apps in order to continue to use them. If you do not accept updates, the Ignite Services, Third Party Apps and any Content you purchased through an In-App Purchase may become non-functional.

PRIVACY

Harman will only use personal data that we collect through Ignite in accordance with this EULA. Each Third Party App has their own separate privacy policy, that Harman does not control. You should refer to each Third Party App provider to learn what their privacy policies are.

You understand that you may need to share your personal data with the applicable App providers so that those Apps can provide services to you. The App providers may use your personal data to offer/market their services (including in-app purchases, upgrades, as well as support services) to you. Likewise, the manufacturer of your vehicle may have agreements with an App provider to permit sharing of your personal data to the vehicle manufacturer. Harman itself, however, will never use your personal data to market to you. Our privacy policy sets out any situations in which we will need to share your personal data with an App providers and/or vehicle manufacturer, and asks you for your specific consent to this use of your personal data.

IGNITE uses the internet to communicate between your vehicle and the Apps, as well as to communicate with the Ignite servers. Communication and transmission of information using the Internet can never be completely secure or private. Any information that you send using an App risks being read or accessed by others even if that transmission is encrypted.

By using IGNITE itself as well as any Apps within IGNITE, you agree to our collection and use of technical information about the Apps and about the Devices (and related software, hardware and peripherals) to help us improve our services and products and to provide any Services to you. Ignite may automatically download and install updates for Ignite itself as well as for Apps within Ignite. These updates may take the form of bug fixes, new features, or new versions. You agree to receive such updates from Harman as part of your use of Ignite.

For IGNITE to function as intended, the Device in your vehicle will periodically send location data, and You cannot turn off this functionality. Additionally, some of the Apps may wish to make use of and may rely on location data sent from your vehicle. For how Apps do or don’t require or use location data, you should check the applicable terms of service for those Apps. .

Apps within IGNITE may contain links to their own websites as well as to other independent websites, none of which are provided by us. All such websites are not under our control, and we are not responsible for and have not checked or approved their content, their terms of service or their privacy policies (if any). Ignite may facilitate you being able to visit such sites and to purchase goods or services through Apps or to sites you are redirected to by an App. Nevertheless, You will need to make your own independent judgement about whether to use any such independent websites, including whether to buy any products or services offered through such Apps and websites.

IGNITE IS PROVIDED “AS IS” AND ON AN “AS AVAILABLE” BASIS AND TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED UNDER APPLICABLE LAW WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, WHETHER EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHER, INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT, AND ALL WARRANTIES ARISING FROM COURSE OF DEALING, USAGE OR TRADE PRACTICE. WITHOUT LIMITATION TO THE FOREGOING, WE PROVIDE NO WARRANTY OR UNDERTAKING, AND MAKE NO REPRESENTATION OF ANY KIND THAT THE IGNITE APP, IGNITE DEVICE OR ANY OF THE THIRD PARTY SERVICES WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, ACHIEVE ANY INTENDED RESULTS, BE COMPATIBLE OR WORK WITH ANY OTHER SOFTWARE, APPLICATIONS, SYSTEMS OR SERVICES, OPERATE WITHOUT INTERRUPTION, BE AVAILABLE OR OPERATE IN ALL GEOGRAPHIC AREAS, MEET ANY PERFORMANCE OR RELIABILITY STANDARDS OR BE ERROR FREE, OR THAT ANY ERRORS OR DEFECTS CAN OR WILL BE CORRECTED.

NEITHER HARMAN NOR THE VEHICLE MANUFACTURER ARE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES OR HARM THAT COULD HAVE BEEN AVOIDED BY APPLYING AN UPDATE OFFERED TO YOU NOR FOR DAMAGE THAT WAS CAUSED BY YOU FAILING TO CORRECTLY FOLLOW INSTALLATION OR UPGRADE INSTRUCTIONS.

NEITHER HARMAN NOR THE VEHICLE MANUFACTURER ARE RESPONSIBLE TO YOU FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE THAT YOU SUFFER AS A RESULT OF USING ANY APPS. YOU SHOULD REFER TO THE TERMS OF SERVICE OF THE PARTICULAR THIRD-PARTY SERVICE PROVIDER IF YOU SUFFER A LOSS OR DAMAGE AS A RESULT OF USING THEIR APP.

YOU EXPRESSLY ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT THE USE OF OR ANY RELIANCE UPON ANY INFORMATION OR CONTENT AVAILABLE THROUGH IGNITE IS SOLELY AND COMPLETELY AT YOUR OWN RISK AND RESPONSIBILITY, AND THAT SUCH INFORMATION OR CONTENT MAY NOT ALWAYS BE ACCURATE. IT IS YOUR SOLE RESPONSIBILITY TO ENSURE THAT YOU (AND/OR ANY OTHER USER OR OCCUPANT OF YOUR VEHICLE) EXERCISE GOOD JUDGMENT AS TO INFORMATION OR CONTENT CONSUMED THROUGH IGNITE. IT IS ALSO YOUR SOLE RESPONSIBILITY TO ENSURE THAT YOU (AND/OR ANY OTHER USER OR OCCUPANT OF YOUR VEHICLE) OBEY TRAFFIC RULES AND ALL OTHER APPLICABLE LAWS AND REGULATIONS WHEN OPERATING YOUR VEHICLE, ACCESSING AND/OR USING IGNITE AND/OR APPS WITHIN IGNITE, PERMITTING OTHERS TO USE YOUR VEHICLE AND/OR EVALUATING WHETHER THE USE OF ANY OF THE SERVICE FEATURES IS SAFE AND LEGAL UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES.

YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT IGNITE WAS NOT DEVELOPED TO MEET YOUR INDIVIDUAL REQUIREMENTS, AND THAT IT IS THEREFORE YOUR RESPONSIBILITY TO ENSURE THAT THE FEATURES AND FUNCTIONS OF IGNITE AND THE THIRD-PARTY APPS WITHIN AND THE SERVICES WITHIN THOSE APPS MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS.

APPLICABLE LAW MAY NOT ALLOW CERTAIN LIMITATIONS OF EXCLUSIONS OF LIABILITY OR INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES, SO THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS OR EXCLUSIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.
